post.subject: Primogem Rewards: The Sabzeruz Festival Begins! Take Part in Nahida's Birthday Party to Win Primogems!
post.content: Olah! Hello, Traveler~ I received an invitation to go to Sumeru and attend Nahida's birthday party! Traveler, wanna come along? How to Participate Method 1: Share a screenshot of the farthest distance you traveled with the Flower Carriage in infinity mode and the number of flowers you collected in the comments section. Method 2: Go to the game and take a photo with the character easter eggs that appear in Sumeru, and wish Nahida a happy birthday in the comments section using the tone of the character you took the photo with.

post.subject: Character Companionship Feature now upgraded! Earn Companionship Points with ease and redeem more Character Decorations with a single click~
post.content: Olah~ Hello, Travelers! The Character Companionship feature has been upgraded! Let's take a look at what's changed together! Companion Widget Upgraded! 1. A new medium-sized widget has been added, allowing you to accompany multiple characters on a single screen. 2. The original "Trending Discussions" section has been changed to "Companionship Records," displaying the corresponding character's emojis after a day of companionship!

post.subject: Primogem Rewards: Participate in Mualani and Kaedehara Kazuha's Topic Discussions and Earn Primogems
post.content: Olah! Hello, Travelers~ Leave a comment below for a chance to win Primogems and receive guaranteed character avatar frame rewards! As a member of the People of the Springs' new generation of young guides, Mualani has already established an eminent name for herself throughout Natlan. As Mualani's friend, why not take this opportunity to be a guide for Natlan? Plan a tour route of Natlan for Kaedehara Kazuha, who loves exploring mountains and forests! Hilichurl's Hint: Enter "Mualani" or "Kaedehara Kazuha" in the comments section to trigger a surprise easter egg! Come try it out! Tip: An easter egg will only be triggered when the name of one character is indicated in the comments. How to Participate

post.subject: Primogem Rewards: Greetings, Fairytale Kingdom Photographer! Take Part to Win Primogems!
post.content: Olah! Hello, Traveler~ I entered a mysterious place in my dream! Origami animals, toy figures... Is this the fairytale world? How to Participate Head to the new area "Simulanka" in the game and complete any of the following missions, and your participation will have been deemed successful. Mission 1: Take pictures of any two different origami residents in the Forest of Blessings and share them in the comments. Mission 2: Use your favorite character to take a group photo with any two toy figures of different colors in Constellation Metropole and share it in the comments. Mission 3: Take a picture of any miner gopher in the Broken Sea and share it in the comments. In addition, when exploring the new area in Version 4.8, you can also invite "Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara (Dendro) to your party and obtain a new outfit reward. Mission 4: Select your favorite scenery in the new area and take photos of Kirara's new outfit, and share it in the comments.
